ChildBranches.Name: Increase your Hearts
ChildBranches.Description: [Spend a Secret to improve your Hearts, unless it's higher than 150.]

ChildBranches.Name: Answer questions about your past
ChildBranches.Description: $Ambition -> 大望$You've kept your secrets long enough. [Unmask yourself! This will allow you to select a Past, Ambition, and form of preferred address - also providing you with a specialist ability bonus.]

ChildBranches.Name: Invite them to dine with you
ChildBranches.Description: $Officer -> オフィサー$[Not yet. This Officer's story will open later in development.]
